org.shared.net.handler

Class SynchronousHandler<C extends Connection>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.shared.net.handler.AbstractFilteredHandler<SynchronousHandler<C>,C,ByteBuffer>
      • org.shared.net.handler.SynchronousHandler<C>
  • Type Parameters:
    C - the Connection type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, ConnectionHandler<C>, FilteredHandler<SynchronousHandler<C>,C,ByteBuffer>, OobHandler<C>

    public class SynchronousHandler<C extends Connection>
extends AbstractFilteredHandler<SynchronousHandler<C>,C,ByteBuffer>
    A subclass of AbstractFilteredHandler with synchronous behavior.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  SynchronousHandler.ManagedInputStream
      A subclass of InputStream that is managed underneath.

      A subclass of OutputStream that is managed underneath.
      protected static interface  SynchronousHandler.Resolver
      Defines a gadget that supports SynchronousHandler.ManagedInputStream and SynchronousHandler.ManagedOutputStream.
